spells.name: Jaws of the Beast
spells.description: Warwick lunges forward and bites his target, dealing damage based on their maximum health and healing for damage dealt.

spells.name: Blood Hunt
spells.description: Warwick senses enemies below 50% health, gaining Move Speed toward and attack speed against them. When they fall below 20% health, he frenzies and these bonuses triple.

spells.name: Primal Howl
spells.description: Warwick gains damage reduction for 2.5 seconds. At the end, or if re-activated, he howls, causing nearby enemies to flee for 1 second.

spells.name: Infinite Duress
spells.description: Warwick leaps in a direction (scaling with his bonus Move Speed), suppressing the first champion he collides with for 1.5 seconds.

passive.name: Eternal Hunger
passive.description: Warwick's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage. If Warwick is below 50% health, he heals the same amount. If Warwick is below 25% health, this healing triples.

spells.name: Starlight's Touch
spells.description: Heals nearby allied champions based on charges stored. Bravado-empowered attacks grant a charge of Starlight's Touch.

spells.name: Bastion
spells.description:
Passively increase the Armor of Taric and any allied champion with Bastion.

Actively shields an ally and grants them Bastion for as long as they remain near Taric. Taric's spells also cast off the ally with Bastion.

spells.name: Dazzle
spells.description: Taric readies a beam of starlight that, after a brief delay, deals magic damage and stuns enemies.

spells.name: Cosmic Radiance
spells.description: Pulses cosmic energy onto nearby allied champions after a delay, making them invulnerable for a short duration.

passive.name: Bravado
passive.description: Spellcasts empower Taric's next 2 basic attacks to deal bonus magic damage, reduce his spell cooldowns, and attack in quick succession.

spells.name: Infected Bonesaw
spells.description: Dr. Mundo throws an infected bonesaw, dealing damage to the first enemy hit based on their current health and slowing them.

spells.name: Heart Zapper
spells.description: Dr. Mundo electrocutes himself, dealing persistent damage to nearby enemies and storing a portion of damage he takes. At the end of the duration or on Recast, Dr. Mundo deals a burst of damage to nearby enemies. If the burst hit an enemy, he heals a percentage of the stored damage.

spells.name: Blunt Force Trauma
spells.description:
Passive - Dr. Mundo gains bonus Attack Damage, increasing based on his max Health.

Active - Dr. Mundo slams his “medical” bag into an enemy, dealing additional damage based on his missing Health. If the enemy dies they are swatted away, dealing damage to enemies they pass through.

spells.name: Maximum Dosage
spells.description: Dr. Mundo pumps himself with chemicals, instantly healing a percent of his missing Health. He then gains Move Speed and regenerates a portion of his maximum Health over a long duration.

passive.name: Goes Where He Pleases
passive.description:
Dr. Mundo resists the first Immobilizing effect that hits him, instead losing Health and dropping a chemical cannister nearby. Dr. Mundo can pick it up by walking over it, restoring Health and reducing this Ability's Cooldown.

Dr. Mundo also has significantly increased Health regeneration.

spells.name: Terrify
spells.description: Fiddlesticks damaging enemies with spells while unseen or targeting an enemy with Terrify's activation strikes a target unit with fear, causing it to flee in terror for a duration.

spells.name: Bountiful Harvest
spells.description: Fiddlesticks drains health from nearby enemies, dealing bonus execute damage at the end of the duration.

spells.name: Reap
spells.description: Fiddlesticks slashes an area with its scythe, slowing all enemies hit and silencing enemies hit in the center of the slash.

spells.name: Crowstorm
spells.description: A murder of crows flock wildly around Fiddlesticks, dealing damage per second to all enemy units in the area.

passive.name: A Harmless Scarecrow
passive.description: Fiddlesticks' trinket is replaced by scarecrow effigies.

spells.name: Double Daggers
spells.description: Xayah throws two damaging daggers that also drop Feathers she can recall.

spells.name: Deadly Plumage
spells.description: Xayah creates a storm of blades that increase her Attack Speed and damage while also granting her Move Speed if she attacks a champion.

spells.name: Bladecaller
spells.description: Xayah calls back all her dropped Feathers dealing damage and rooting enemies.

spells.name: Featherstorm
spells.description: Xayah leaps into the air becoming untargetable and throwing out a fan of daggers, dropping Feathers she can recall.

passive.name: Clean Cuts
passive.description: After using an ability, Xayah's next basic attacks will hit all targets along their path and leave a <font color='#C200E1'>Feather</font>.

spells.name: Pierce
spells.description: Throw a fast moving spear that passes through enemies it kills.

spells.name: Sentinel
spells.description:
Gain bonus damage when Kalista and her Oathsworn strike the same target.

Activate to send a soul to scout out the path, revealing the area in front of it.

spells.name: Rend
spells.description: Attacks impale their targets with spears. Activate to rip the spears out, slowing and dealing escalating damage.

spells.name: Fate's Call
spells.description: Kalista teleports the Oathsworn ally to herself. They gain the ability to dash toward a position, knocking enemy champions back.

passive.name: Martial Poise
passive.description: Enter a movement command while winding up Kalista's basic attack or Pierce to lunge a short distance when she launches her attack.

spells.name: Steel Tempest
spells.description:
Thrusts forward, damaging all enemies in a line.

On hit, grants a stack of Gathering Storm for a few seconds. At 2 stacks, Steel Tempest fires a whirlwind that knocks Airborne.

Steel Tempest is treated as a basic attack and scales with all the same things.

spells.name: Wind Wall
spells.description: Creates a moving wall that blocks all enemy projectiles for 4 seconds.

spells.name: Sweeping Blade
spells.description:
Dashes through target enemy, dealing magic damage. Each cast increases subsequent dash's damage, up to a max amount.

Cannot be re-cast on the same enemy for a few seconds.

If Steel Tempest is cast while dashing, it will strike as a circle.

spells.name: Last Breath
spells.description:
Blinks to an Airborne enemy champion, dealing physical damage and holding all Airborne enemies in the area in the air. Grants maximum Flow but resets all stacks of Gathering Storm.

For a moderate time afterwards, Yasuo's critical strikes gain significant Bonus Armor Penetration.

passive.name: Way of the Wanderer
passive.description: Yasuo's Critical Strike Chance is increased. Additionally, Yasuo builds toward a shield whenever he is moving. The shield triggers when he takes damage from a champion or monster.

spells.name: High Note
spells.description: Seraphine deals damage in an area.

spells.name: Surround Sound
spells.description: Seraphine Shields and Hastes nearby allies. If she is already Shielded she will Heal nearby allies as well.

spells.name: Beat Drop
spells.description: Seraphine deals damage and impairs the movement of enemies in a line.

spells.name: Encore
spells.description: Seraphine deals damage and charms enemies hit, refreshing the range with every allied or enemy champion hit.

passive.name: Stage Presence
passive.description: Every third basic spell will cast twice from Seraphine. Additionally, casting spells near allies grants her bonus magic damage and range on her next basic attack.

spells.name: Blooming Blows
spells.description: Passively, Lillia gains stacking Move Speed when hitting enemies with spells. She can activate this to deal magic damage to nearby enemies, dealing extra true damage on the edge.

spells.name: Watch Out! Eep!
spells.description: Lillia deals damage in a nearby area, dealing heavy damage in the center.

spells.name: Swirlseed
spells.description: Lillia hurls a seed that damages and slows those it lands on. If it doesn't hit anything, it will continue rolling until it hits a wall or target.

spells.name: Lilting Lullaby
spells.description: Lillia causes all enemies with Dream Dust on them to become Drowsy before falling asleep. Those enemies will take extra damage on being forcibly woken up.

passive.name: Dream-Laden Bough
passive.description: Hitting a champion or monster with a skill will deal additional max Health damage over time.

spells.name: Blooming Burst
spells.description: Neeko throws a seed dealing magic damage. The seed blooms again on hitting champions or killing units.

spells.name: Shapesplitter
spells.description: Neeko passively deals bonus magic damage every third attack. Neeko can activate to send a clone in a direction.

spells.name: Tangle-Barbs
spells.description: Neeko slings a tangle that damage and root everything it passes through. If the tangle kills an enemy or passes through a champion, it becomes larger, faster, and roots for longer.

spells.name: Pop Blossom
spells.description: After a short preparation, Neeko leaps into the air. Upon landing, nearby enemies are damaged and knocked up. The preparation is hidden if Neeko is disguised.

passive.name: Inherent Glamour
passive.description: Neeko can look like an ally champion. Taking damage from enemy Champions or casting damaging spells breaks the disguise.
